transfers.title: 智能交互系统
transfers.description: 为某大型企业开发的智能人机交互系统，提高了生产效率30%。
transfers.description_en: Developed an intelligent HCI system for a large enterprise, improving production efficiency by 30%.

transfers.title: AR导航系统
transfers.description: 开发的AR导航系统已在多个商场和展馆成功部署。
transfers.description_en: The AR navigation system has been successfully deployed in multiple shopping malls and exhibition halls.

transfers.title: 情感计算平台
transfers.description: 研发的情感计算平台已服务超过100家企业客户。
transfers.description_en: The developed affective computing platform has served over 100 enterprise clients.
